sourcesContent:
import { useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native';
import * as Speech from 'expo-speech'
import React, { useContext } from 'react'
import { View, Text, TouchableHighlight } from 'react-native'
import { AppContext } from '../../App';
import NavigationBar from '../components/NavigationBar'

export default function MorningTimePage() {
  const navigation = useNavigation()
  const appContext = useContext(AppContext)
  appContext.dayNumber += 1
  Speech.speak(defaultLabelText)
  return (
    <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
      <View style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: 'grey' }}>
        <Text>Morning Time of Day {appContext.dayNumber}</Text>
      </View>
      <View style={{ flex: 9 }}>
        <View style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: '#cc0066' }}>
          <Text>{defaultLabelText}</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={{ flex: 1, backgroundColor: 'white' }}>
          <TouchableHighlight style={{ width: '100%', height: '100%', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }} 
            onPress={() => { doSomething(navigation) }}>
            <Text>Move on to Day Time phase</Text>
          </TouchableHighlight>
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <NavigationBar previousPage='NightTimePage' nextPage='DayTimePage'></NavigationBar>
      </View>
    </View>
  )
}

function doSomething(navigation:any) {
  Speech.stop()
  navigation.push('DayTimePage')
}

const defaultLabelText = '"Good morning, everyone! It is the morning of the first day. Get ready to greet another beee-yutiful day" \
\n\n \
Victim - Discard one item card. (This attack cannot be negated or deflected)'
